mapper.sql: PC.f_id as PCid,PC.f_name as PCname,PC.f_edit_name as PCeditName,PC.f_bank_name as PCbankName,PC.f_account_no as PCaccountNo,PC.f_account_name as PCaccountName,PC.f_bank_branch as PCbankBranch,PC.f_bank_province as PCbankProvince,PC.f_bank_city as PCbankCity,PC.f_revenue_date as PCrevenueDate,PC.f_edit_bank_name as PCeditBankName,PC.f_edit_account_no as PCeditAccountNo,PC.f_edit_account_name as PCeditAccountName,PC.f_edit_bank_branch as PCeditBankBranch,PC.f_edit_bank_province as PCeditBankProvince,PC.f_edit_bank_city as PCeditBankCity,PC.f_edit_revenue_date as PCeditRevenueDate,PC.f_tel as PCtel,PC.f_edit_tel as PCeditTel,PC.f_desc as PCdesc,PC.f_admin_id as PCadminId,PC.f_email as PCemail,PC.f_mobile_phone as PCmobilePhone,PC.f_edit_mobile_phone as PCeditMobilePhone,PC.f_linkMan as PClinkman,PC.f_edit_linkMan as PCeditLinkman,PC.f_photo_credentials as PCphotoCredentials,PC.f_photo_business_license as PCphotoBusinessLicense,PC.f_is_audited as PCisAudited,PC.f_is_edit as PCisEdit,PC.f_audit_result as PCauditResult,PC.f_cooperation_type as PCcooperationType,PC.f_edit_result as PCeditResult,date_format(PC.f_light_cooperation_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PClightCooperationTime,PC.f_is_light_cooperation as PCisLightCooperation,date_format(PC.f_high_cooperation_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PChighCooperationTime,PC.f_is_high_cooperation as PCisHighCooperation,date_format(PC.f_all_cooperation_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PCallCooperationTime,PC.f_is_all_cooperation as PCisAllCooperation,PC.f_caropen__status as PCcaropenStatus,PC.f_photo_url as PCphotoUrl,PC.f_follower as PCfollower

PC1.f_id as PC1id,PC1.f_name as PC1name,PC1.f_edit_name as PC1editName,PC1.f_bank_name as PC1bankName,PC1.f_account_no as PC1accountNo,PC1.f_account_name as PC1accountName,PC1.f_bank_branch as PC1bankBranch,PC1.f_bank_province as PC1bankProvince,PC1.f_bank_city as PC1bankCity,PC1.f_revenue_date as PC1revenueDate,PC1.f_edit_bank_name as PC1editBankName,PC1.f_edit_account_no as PC1editAccountNo,PC1.f_edit_account_name as PC1editAccountName,PC1.f_edit_bank_branch as PC1editBankBranch,PC1.f_edit_bank_province as PC1editBankProvince,PC1.f_edit_bank_city as PC1editBankCity,PC1.f_edit_revenue_date as PC1editRevenueDate,PC1.f_tel as PC1tel,PC1.f_edit_tel as PC1editTel,PC1.f_desc as PC1desc,PC1.f_admin_id as PC1adminId,PC1.f_email as PC1email,PC1.f_mobile_phone as PC1mobilePhone,PC1.f_edit_mobile_phone as PC1editMobilePhone,PC1.f_linkMan as PC1linkman,PC1.f_edit_linkMan as PC1editLinkman,PC1.f_photo_credentials as PC1photoCredentials,PC1.f_photo_business_license as PC1photoBusinessLicense,PC1.f_is_audited as PC1isAudited,PC1.f_is_edit as PC1isEdit,PC1.f_audit_result as PC1auditResult,PC1.f_cooperation_type as PC1cooperationType,PC1.f_edit_result as PC1editResult,date_format(PC1.f_light_cooperation_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PC1lightCooperationTime,PC1.f_is_light_cooperation as PC1isLightCooperation,date_format(PC1.f_high_cooperation_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PC1highCooperationTime,PC1.f_is_high_cooperation as PC1isHighCooperation,date_format(PC1.f_all_cooperation_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PC1allCooperationTime,PC1.f_is_all_cooperation as PC1isAllCooperation,PC1.f_caropen__status as PC1caropenStatus,PC1.f_photo_url as PC1photoUrl,PC1.f_follower as PC1follower

if.test: _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == null or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == '' or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == false or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM != true

mapper.sql: UPDATE t_property_company ,f_name=#{name} ,f_edit_name=#{editName} ,f_bank_name=#{bankName} ,f_account_no=#{accountNo} ,f_account_name=#{accountName} ,f_bank_branch=#{bankBranch} ,f_bank_province=#{bankProvince} ,f_bank_city=#{bankCity} ,f_revenue_date=#{revenueDate} ,f_edit_bank_name=#{editBankName} ,f_edit_account_no=#{editAccountNo} ,f_edit_account_name=#{editAccountName} ,f_edit_bank_branch=#{editBankBranch} ,f_edit_bank_province=#{editBankProvince} ,f_edit_bank_city=#{editBankCity} ,f_edit_revenue_date=#{editRevenueDate} ,f_tel=#{tel} ,f_edit_tel=#{editTel} ,f_desc=#{desc} ,f_admin_id=#{adminId} ,f_email=#{email} ,f_mobile_phone=#{mobilePhone} ,f_edit_mobile_phone=#{editMobilePhone} ,f_linkMan=#{linkman} ,f_edit_linkMan=#{editLinkman} ,f_photo_credentials=#{photoCredentials} ,f_photo_business_license=#{photoBusinessLicense} ,f_is_audited=#{isAudited} ,f_is_edit=#{isEdit} ,f_audit_result=#{auditResult} ,f_cooperation_type=#{cooperationType} ,f_edit_result=#{editResult} ,f_light_cooperation_time=str_to_date(#{lightCooperationTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_is_light_cooperation=#{isLightCooperation} ,f_high_cooperation_time=str_to_date(#{highCooperationTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_is_high_cooperation=#{isHighCooperation} ,f_all_cooperation_time=str_to_date(#{allCooperationTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_is_all_cooperation=#{isAllCooperation} ,f_caropen__status=#{caropenStatus} ,f_photo_url=#{photoUrl} ,f_follower=#{follower} ,f_sys0_add_time=str_to_date(#{sys0AddTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_edit_time=str_to_date(#{sys0EditTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_upd_time=str_to_date(#{sys0UpdTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time=str_to_date(#{sys0DelTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time= sysdate() ,f_sys0_add_user=#{sys0AddUser} ,f_sys0_upd_user=#{sys0UpdUser} ,f_sys0_del_user=#{sys0DelUser} ,f_sys0_del_state= 1 WHERE 1=1 AND f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND f_id=#{id}

update.foreach: UPDATE t_property_company ,f_name=#{item.name} ,f_edit_name=#{item.editName} ,f_bank_name=#{item.bankName} ,f_account_no=#{item.accountNo} ,f_account_name=#{item.accountName} ,f_bank_branch=#{item.bankBranch} ,f_bank_province=#{item.bankProvince} ,f_bank_city=#{item.bankCity} ,f_revenue_date=#{item.revenueDate} ,f_edit_bank_name=#{item.editBankName} ,f_edit_account_no=#{item.editAccountNo} ,f_edit_account_name=#{item.editAccountName} ,f_edit_bank_branch=#{item.editBankBranch} ,f_edit_bank_province=#{item.editBankProvince} ,f_edit_bank_city=#{item.editBankCity} ,f_edit_revenue_date=#{item.editRevenueDate} ,f_tel=#{item.tel} ,f_edit_tel=#{item.editTel} ,f_desc=#{item.desc} ,f_admin_id=#{item.adminId} ,f_email=#{item.email} ,f_mobile_phone=#{item.mobilePhone} ,f_edit_mobile_phone=#{item.editMobilePhone} ,f_linkMan=#{item.linkman} ,f_edit_linkMan=#{item.editLinkman} ,f_photo_credentials=#{item.photoCredentials} ,f_photo_business_license=#{item.photoBusinessLicense} ,f_is_audited=#{item.isAudited} ,f_is_edit=#{item.isEdit} ,f_audit_result=#{item.auditResult} ,f_cooperation_type=#{item.cooperationType} ,f_edit_result=#{item.editResult} ,f_light_cooperation_time=str_to_date(#{item.lightCooperationTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_is_light_cooperation=#{item.isLightCooperation} ,f_high_cooperation_time=str_to_date(#{item.highCooperationTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_is_high_cooperation=#{item.isHighCooperation} ,f_all_cooperation_time=str_to_date(#{item.allCooperationTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_is_all_cooperation=#{item.isAllCooperation} ,f_caropen__status=#{item.caropenStatus} ,f_photo_url=#{item.photoUrl} ,f_follower=#{item.follower} ,f_sys0_add_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0AddTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_edit_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0EditTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_upd_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0UpdTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0DelTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time= sysdate() ,f_sys0_add_user=#{item.sys0AddUser} ,f_sys0_upd_user=#{item.sys0UpdUser} ,f_sys0_del_user=#{item.sys0DelUser} ,f_sys0_del_state= 1 WHERE 1=1 AND f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND f_id=#{item.id}

mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM t_property_company WHERE 1=1 AND f_id IN
#{item}
